chapter.title: Statement Model Layer
chapter.para: In the following sections we will discuss the Statement Model Layer of the Knowledge Architecture.

The Statement Model Layer () defines how individual data elements are combined to form complete clinical statements, using the terminology and structures established in earlier layers. It incorporates standards-based models such as ANF and CIMI, and supports implementation through formats like HL7 V2, CDA, and FHIRÂ®.
